Identifier.help: Unique string that identifies the resource

Creator.help: Main researchers involved / author of publication in priority order

OPT_nameIdentifier.help: Uniquely identifies an individual or legal entity

nameIdentifierScheme.help: Name of the identifier scheme: ORCID, ISNI, ROR, ...

Title.help: name or title by which resource is known ; name of software or instrument as instance

Publisher.help: The name of the entity that holds, archives, publishes, prints, distributes, releases, issues, or produces the resource.

ResourceType.help: Brief description of the resource. see: https://datacite-metadata-schema.readthedocs.io/_/downloads/en/4.5/pdf/#47

resourceTypeGeneral.help: The general type of the resource.

Subject.help: Subject, keyword, classification code, or key phrase describing the resource

OPT_subjectScheme.help: The name of the subject scheme or classification code or authority if one is used. Example: ANZSRC Fields of Research

OPT_classificationCode.help: The classification code used for the subject term in the subject scheme.
